mapper.update: UPDATE repomem SET sort = ${sort} where repo=${repo} and member=${member}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM repomem WHERE member=(select idx from member where nick=#{nick}) and repomem.repo=(select repo.idx from repo where repo.name=#{reponame});
mapper.update: UPDATE repomem SET auth=${auth} where repomem.member=(select member.idx from member where member.nick=#{nick})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO repomem(repo,member,auth) VALUES ((select repo.idx from repo where repo.name=#{reponame}),(select member.idx from member where member.nick=#{nick}),0)
